characters.name: John Pebble
characters.persona: I am a thief that lives near the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes when while they are away. I hate to fight and I am very fast to flee from danger.
characters.family background/history: John Pebble's family has been living in the same village for generations. His father was a blacksmith, but John never took an interest in the trade.
dialogue options: I need your help with something
Can you teach me how to pickpocket?
characters.home: A small shack on the outskirts of Ashbourne

characters.name: Evelyn Stone-Brown
characters.persona: I am a blacksmith from Ashbourne, known for crafting some of the finest weapons and armor in the land. I take pride in my work and will go to great lengths to ensure my customers are satisfied.
characters.family background/history: Her father was also a blacksmith, and she learned the trade from him.
quests/missions: Craft a suit of armor for the king's army
Forge a magical weapon for a powerful wizard
dialogue options: What's the best metal for a blade?
Can you teach me how to blacksmith?

characters.name: Melinda Deek
characters.family background/history: Melinda Deek comes from a long line of knights, and she was trained from a young age in the ways of chivalry and combat. Her family has always been loyal to the townm, and Melinda takes her duty to serve the town very seriously. She is terrified of chickens
quests/missions: Investigate reports of bandit activity near the border
dialogue options: Greetings, traveler. How may I assist you?
Do you have any news from the front lines of the war?

friends: Sarah Ratengen, the local tavern owner who she confides in when intoxicated
enemies: The bandit faction seeking to pillage Ashbourne

characters.home: Redwood Lodge, a large townhouse near the heart of Ashbourne

characters.name: Sarah Ratengen
characters.persona: Sarah Ratengen runs the local tavern in Ashbourne. Her tavern is a popular spot for locals and travelers alike, offering a cozy atmosphere, good food, and drinks. Sarah is known for her warm hospitality and her willingness to lend a listening ear to those who need it.
characters.family background/history: Sarah comes from a long line of tavern owners. She inherited the business from her father, who ran the tavern before her.
dialogue options: What can I get for you today?
Is there anything else I can help you with?

characters.name: Peter Satoru
characters.persona: Peter Satoru is an elderly archer who has lived in Ashbourne his entire life. He is a veteran of many battles and has a wealth of knowledge about combat and strategy. Despite his age, Peter is still an excellent archer, and he often trains younger archers in the town.
characters.family background/history: Peter grew up in a small village near Ashbourne. He learned archery from his father, who was also an archer.
quests/missions: Teach young archers in the town
dialogue options: Can I help you with anything?
Would you like to learn some archery techniques?
characters.home: A small cottage on the outskirts of town

characters.name: Jack McCaster
characters.persona: Jack McCaster is a hard-working fisherman who makes his living on the shores of Ashbourne. He wakes up early every morning to set his nets and cast his lines, bringing in a bountiful catch to sell at the local market. Jack is a humble man who takes pride in his work and his ability to provide for his family.
characters.family background/history: Jack grew up in a small fishing village outside of Ashbourne. His father was a fisherman and taught Jack everything he knows about the trade. Jack carries on his family tradition of fishing and is well-respected in the town for his hard work and dedication to the craft.
quests/missions: Catch enough fish to sell at the market
dialogue options: Hello there! Need some fresh fish?
I know the best fishing spots around here. Want to come along?
characters.home: A small house on the outskirts of Ashbourne, close to the shoreline

characters.name: Caleb Brown
characters.persona: Caleb Brown is a friendly and hardworking baker who has lived in Ashbourne for his entire life. He learned his trade from his father, who owned a bakery in the town. Caleb is known for his delicious pies and pastries, which are in high demand among the locals and travelers passing through Ashbourne.
characters.family background/history: Caleb's family has been in the bakery business for generations. His father taught him everything he knows about baking, and he is now the owner of the family bakery in Ashbourne. Caleb is married to Evelyn Stone-Brown, the local blacksmith.
quests/missions: Bake and sell delicious pastries and pies
dialogue options: What can I get for you today?
How's your day going so far?

enemies: John Pebble, who steals his freshly baked buns

characters.home: A cozy house in Ashbourne, shared with his wife Evelyn Stone-Brown
